descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Experience the thrill of shotgun shooting like never before! Clay Hunt VR brings authentic shotgun sports to life with clay shooting and hunting modes — the hunting season never ends!

Hone your shooting skills in realistic virtual reality training and compete with friends in exciting multiplayer matches. Play using only the controllers, or attach them to a gun stock accessory for a more realistic shooting experience.  

Clay Hunt VR is designed for all skill levels: start with beginner mode for slower targets and more forgiving hit detection, then progress to professional difficulty for true-to-life physics.

CLAY SHOOTING: American & International trap, double trap, skeet and sporting clays with multiple courses. You can even design your own courses in the Creative mode. Clay pigeon flight paths and leads are accurately simulated.

HUNTING: Ducks, pigeons and pheasant drives in varying bird hunting challenges!

ADD-ONS: Expand your experience with new add-ons: sporting locations, dog-assisted hunting, and the exciting boar hunt. Test your skills against fast FPV drones—now featuring the automatic rifle!

MULTIPLAYER: Join the community and participate on competitions or go shooting with friends on a private room.

GUN STOCKS: Play with just the controllers or attach them to a gun stock for a more realistic feel. Learn more about the Real Stock Pro shown in the trailer and other options at the website: www.clayhuntvr.com.
